text: Veruyushchiye ne dolzhny schitat' neveruyushchikh svoimi pomoshchnikami i druz'yami vmesto veruyushchikh. A kto postupayet tak, tot ne imeyet nikakogo otnosheniya k Allakhu, za isklyucheniyem tekh sluchayev, kogda vy deystvitel'no opasayetes' ikh. Allakh predosteregayet vas ot Samogo Sebya, i k Allakhu predstoit pribytiye
